verses.verse: The fool <WH5036> has said <WH559> in his heart, <WH3820> "There is no God. <WH430>" They are corrupt. <WH7843> They have done abominable <WH8581> works. <WH5949> There is none who does <WH6213> good. <WH2896>

Yahweh <WH3068> looked down <WH8259> from heaven <WH8064> on the children <WH1121> of men, <WH120> to see <WH7200> if there <WH3426> were any who understood, <WH7919> who sought <WH1875> after God. <WH430>
They have all gone aside. <WH5493> They have together <WH3162> become corrupt. <WH444> There is none who does <WH6213> good, <WH2896> no, <WH259> not one.
Have all the workers <WH6466> of iniquity <WH205> no knowledge, <WH3045> who eat up <WH398> my people <WH5971> as they eat <WH398> bread, <WH3899> and don't <WH7121> call on Yahweh? <WH3068>
There they were in great <WH6343> fear, <WH6342> for God <WH430> is in the generation <WH1755> of the righteous. <WH6662>
You frustrate <WH954> the plan <WH6098> of the poor, <WH6041> because Yahweh <WH3068> is his refuge. <WH4268>

Oh that <WH5414> the salvation <WH3444> of Israel <WH3478> would come out of Zion! <WH6726> When Yahweh <WH3068> restores <WH3068> the fortunes <WH7622> of his people, <WH5971> then Jacob <WH3290> shall rejoice, <WH1523> and Israel <WH3478> shall be glad. <WH8055>
